subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Johan Franzen scored three times for Detroit in a victory Saturday over the Avalanche, giving the .H.L.’s top-seeded team a 2-0 lead in the Western Conference semifinal.
snippet: Johan Franzen scored three times for Detroit in a victory Saturday over the Avalanche, giving the .H.L.’s top-seeded team a 2-0 lead in the Western Conference semifinal.
